children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:
test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:40:15Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.170  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.179  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address    Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.0.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.0.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/1*  active       idle   10.1.0.12         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.0.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.0.8          
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address    Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.0.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0   active       idle   10.1.0.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0

' = get_juju_status('test')
